item.title: Curriculum Fine-tuning of Vision Foundation Model for Medical Image Classification Under Label Noise
item.description: CUFIT: a novel curriculum fine-tuning paradigm significantly improves medical image classification accuracy despite noisy labels by leveraging pre-trained Vision Foundation Models.
